channel.title: CVE Feed for SOKRATES-software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SOKRATES-software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6050|2024-08-01T21:25:03.198Z -- sokrates-software -- sowa%20opac
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability in SOKRATES-software SOWA OPAC allows a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). An attacker might trick somebody into using a crafted URL, which will cause a script to be run in user's browser. This issue affects SOWA OPAC software in versions from 4.0 before 4.9.10, from 5.0 before 6.2.12.
